meta.hint:
A sentence has a naming part and an action part. It shows complete thought.
Example - My sister got very good marks. Example - I do exercise every morning.
A sentence starts with a capital letter. It ends with a full stop (.) or another end mark.

content.description: Find and select the complete sentence.
content.extra: after school on Friday, I am going to school.

content.word: She went to the store to buy fruits.
content.description: Find and select the complete sentence.
content.extra: Was completely empty, She went to the store to buy fruits.
